products.name: Tioras Signature Tee
products.description: The quintessential T-shirt. Crafted from ultra-soft pima cotton for a luxury feel and a classic fit. Your canvas for expression.

products.name: Aether Hoodie
products.description: A mid-weight hoodie made with our custom fleece-back jersey. Incredibly soft, with a structured drape that holds its shape.

products.name: Nova Bomber Jacket
products.description: A modern take on the classic bomber. Water-resistant nylon shell with a lightweight insulation for versatile, all-weather wear.

products.name: Zenith Performance Cap
products.description: Lightweight, breathable, and water-repellent. The Zenith cap is designed for motion, with a sleek profile and adjustable strap.

products.name: Apex Utility Jacket
products.description: Built for the urban explorer. A durable, multi-pocket jacket with a relaxed fit and a weather-resistant finish.

products.name: Origin Long Sleeve
products.description: A versatile layering piece. Made from a breathable, moisture-wicking waffle knit that provides warmth without weight.

products.name: Element Tech Hoodie
products.description: Engineered for performance. This hoodie features a four-way stretch fabric that is both insulating and breathable.

products.name: Classic Logo Cap
products.description: An everyday essential. The classic six-panel cap made from durable cotton twill, featuring an embroidered Tioras logo.
